00045  */

00047 #define USB_INTERFACE_PROTOCOL_KEYBOARD 1
00048 #define USB_INTERFACE_PROTOCOL_MOUSE    2
00049

00051  * HID class requests
00052  */

00054 #define HID_REQ_GET_IDLE        0x02
00055 #define HID_REQ_GET_PROTOCOL        0x03
00056 #define HID_REQ_SET_REPORT      0x09
00057 #define HID_REQ_SET_IDLE        0x0A
00058 #define HID_REQ_SET_PROTOCOL        0x0B

00065 #define HID_DT_PHYSICAL     (USB_TYPE_CLASS | 0x03)
